Name: Drones Club
Ingredients: 15 ml Caribbean blended rum aged 6-10 years
Instructions: Select and pre-chill an Old-fashioned glass .
STRAIN into ice-filled glass (preferably over a large cube or chunk of block ice).
Review: A characterful and well-balanced rum & brandy nightcap.
History: Adapted from a recipe created in January 2020 by Jason Clapham in Oxford, England. Originally made with Cocchi Storico Vermouth di Torino rosso vermouth.
Nutrition: One serving of Drones Club contains 189 calories
